label: Instructions
description: # Horizontal Grid Properties Documentation\n\nThis template documents horizontal grid specifications as compound objects referenced by model components. Based on EMD Section 4.1 requirements.

label: Grid
description: The horizontal grid type.\n\nMANDATORY field from Native horizontal grid Type CV.

label: Description (Optional)
description: Free-text description of the horizontal grid.\n\nOPTIONAL field.
placeholder: Additional horizontal grid details if needed

label: Grid Mapping
description: The coordinate reference system of the horizontal coordinates.\n\nMANDATORY field from Grid Mapping CV.

label: Region
description: The portion of the globe where calculations are performed.\n\nMANDATORY field from Region CV.

label: Temporal Refinement
description: How the distribution of grid cells varies with time.\n\nMANDATORY field from Temporal refinement CV.

label: Arrangement
description: Grid arrangement of orthogonal physical quantities.\n\nMANDATORY field from Arrangement CV.

label: Resolution X
description: Horizontal resolution in X direction.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Resolution Y
description: Horizontal resolution in Y direction.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Horizontal Units
description: Units for resolution_x and resolution_y.\n\nOPTIONAL field - Required if resolution_x or resolution_y are set.

label: N Cells
description: Total number of grid cells.\n\nMANDATORY integer field.

label: N Sides
description: Number of cell sides for unstructured grids.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field.

label: N Vertices
description: Number of vertices for unstructured grids.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field.

label: Truncation Method
description: Method for truncating spherical harmonic expansion.\n\nOPTIONAL field from Truncation method CV.

label: Truncation Number
description: Truncation number for spectral grids.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field.

label: Resolution Range (km)
description:
Minimum and maximum resolution in km.

MANDATORY field as [float,float].

Format: min, max

label: Mean Resolution (km)
description: Mean resolution in km.\n\nMANDATORY float field.

label: Nominal Resolution
description: Nominal resolution characterizing the grid.\n\nMANDATORY field from Nominal resolution CV.

label: Issue Type
description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
